1.title: Alien Invasion

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Travel the world with scientific bounty hunter Don Schultz, as he races to find critical biological specimens in the wild and deliver them to researchers and communities in need.

2.title: Rampage

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Travel the world with scientific bounty hunter Don Schultz, as he races to find critical biological specimens in the wild and deliver them to researchers and communities in need.

3.title: Bounty Hunter

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Travel the world with scientific bounty hunter Don Schultz, as he races to find critical biological specimens in the wild and deliver them to researchers and communities in need.

4.title: Border War

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Donald Schultz returns home to South Africa to extract blood samples from a regal cheetah and two massive rhinos, and hand-capture the fastest striking snake in Africa.

5.title: Bitten

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: Donald Schultz is in Australia collecting samples from some venomous creatures; the taipan and stonefish. His mission is jeopardised when he is bitten, far from medical help.

6.title: Desert Venom

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Animal adventurer Donald Schultz is in Jordan to collect samples from animals that have adapted to life here: deadly snakes, venomous lizards, camel spiders and a hyena.

7.title: Lost Worlds

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Donald Schultz faces Africa's largest land mammal as he explores scientifically uncharted territory along the continent's east coast in the hope of finding new species.

8.title: Hidden Cures

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: The rainforests of Costa Rica may hold cures to many diseases. Donald Schultz is on the ground to collect samples from poison dart frogs, several snakes and a three-toed sloth.

9.title: Moving Target

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Donald Schultz travels to Swaziland in search of a snake that has eluded him all his life: the berg adder. He comes face to face with a deadly mamba, and tests a lion for anthrax.

10.title: Ocean Killers

episode of.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Hunted for their fins, shark populations are plummeting across the globe. Donald Schultz joins scientists in a race against time to save these fearsome predators from extinction.

imdb.plot outline: Venom expert Donald Schultz is willing to risk his own life to save those of others. Whether harvesting venom from the fangs of deadly black mamba in South Africa, or collecting DNA from a 400-pound lion, Donald is fearless in the pursuit of bio-specimens for groundbreaking scientific discoveries.
imdb.title: Venom Hunter with Donald Schultz
